Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Archer
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 106th/Buffalo

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park- bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Montrose
ShortDescription: Forest Park- bound Blue Line trains are standing at Montrose due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park- bound Blue Line trains are standing at Montrose due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
